pr_title: SAK-43535 - Site Info > Manage Groups: Auto-Groups Creation Wizard - …

timeline.message: SAK-43535 - Site Info > Manage Groups: Auto-Groups Creation Wizard - Step 4 Improvements

timeline.bodyText: Can you explain how this works?
timeline.author: fostersdesign

replies.bodyText:
Oh, I see: it will result in "%0xd" where x is the number of digits of the number of groups being created. And then you pass this into the formatter below to pad the group titles with the appropriate number of zeroes. Nice!
Maybe we need a comment to explain what we are trying to achieve here?
replies.author: fostersdesign
